text: What was your first impression of me?
What is the most embarrassing thing that has ever happened to you in public?
What is a secret you have never told anyone here?
Who was your biggest crush in the last 5 years?
What is something you pretend to like but actually don’t?
What is your most irrational fear?
What was your worst date ever and why?
What is the biggest lie you have told without getting caught?
If you could change one thing about your past, what would it be?
What is something you are proud of but rarely talk about?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve done when you thought nobody was watching?
Have you ever had a crush on a friend’s partner or ex?
What’s your most controversial opinion that you actually stand by?
What’s the most childish thing you still enjoy?
What’s the biggest risk you’ve ever taken?
What’s a habit you really want to break but haven’t?
What’s the worst fashion phase you’ve ever gone through?
When was the last time you cried, and why?
What’s something you’re insecure about that people probably wouldn’t expect?
What’s the most trouble you got into at school or university?
What’s the weirdest thing you’ve ever eaten on purpose?
What’s the last thing you searched on your phone browser?
Who in this group would you call first in an emergency and why?
What’s a goal you secretly gave up on?
What is the laziest thing you’ve done recently?
What’s a compliment you received that you’ll never forget?
What is something you are glad your parents don’t know about you?
What’s the most awkward situation you’ve had with someone you liked?
What’s something you did once and immediately regretted?
If you had to choose one person here to be stuck on an island with, who would it be?
What’s your guiltiest pleasure when you’re alone?
What’s the worst text you ever sent to the wrong person?
Have you ever lied to get out of meeting someone here?
What’s a friendship you wish you had handled differently?
What’s something you’ve done just because of peer pressure?
What is the most embarrassing thing in your room right now?
What’s one thing you’re afraid people in this room might secretly think about you?
What’s the most impulsive purchase you’ve ever made?
Who here do you think knows you the best, and why?
What’s a lie you told on social media to make yourself look better?
What’s the most jealous you’ve ever been?
What’s something you wish you were better at but never practice?
What’s the weirdest dream you can remember in detail?
If you could erase one memory, which one would it be?
What is the pettiest reason you ever disliked someone?
What’s something you have done that you would never want your boss or teacher to know about?
What’s the longest you’ve gone without showering, and why?
What’s a small decision that surprisingly changed a lot in your life?
If you had to admit one big mistake from the last year, what would it be?
What’s the most nervous you’ve ever been before meeting someone?
What’s something you really want from life but are scared to say out loud?
